hero.subtitle: Wet wipes for all your needs

about.title: About Us
about.description: Markus Co is a family company from Valjevo, founded in 1994, with a clear mission to provide consumers with quality and affordable personal hygiene products. With modern equipment and a dedicated team, we develop our own brands and successfully cooperate with domestic and international partners, building trust through quality, responsibility and innovation.

tradition.title: 30 Years of Tradition
tradition.description: More than three decades of experience and dedication to quality confirm our place in the market.

certified.title: Certified Production
certified.description: Our products are created under controlled conditions, respecting the highest standards of quality and safety.

dedication.title: Customer Dedication
dedication.description: Our philosophy is based on listening to your needs and continuous improvement of our products and services.

products.title: Our Products
products.description: Our line of wet wipes is designed to meet the most diverse needs - from gentle baby care, through universal cleaning, to specialized disinfection solutions. Quality, practicality, and reliability in every package.

babyFit.title: Baby Fit Wet Wipes
babyFit.description: Baby Fit wet wipes keep your baby's skin soft and fresh. Gently clean and nourish with every diaper change. Soft and full, alcohol-free, pH neutral, and enriched with Vitamin E. Perfect for gentle cleaning of baby's skin without water. Can be used by the whole family.

perfecto.title: Perfecto Wet Wipes
perfecto.description: Perfecto Fit Universal wet wipes remove dirt from all smooth surfaces (furniture and laminated surfaces, tiles and laminate, ceramics, wall tiles, plastic), while Perfecto Fit Wood Surface are used to remove dirt from wooden furniture and wood-like materials with oil to care for them, giving them shine.

universal.title: Universal Wet Wipes
universal.description: Universal Fit and Family Fit wet wipes in family packaging are intended for hand and face hygiene. Soft, refreshing, pH neutral and non-allergenic. Ideal for waterless cleaning.

disinfect.title: Desinfect Wet Wipes
disinfect.description: Disinfect Fit Antibacterial wet wipes are intended for the disinfection of skin and objects. Exclusively for external use. Pocket packaging allows you to carry them everywhere with you.

wet.title: Wet
wet.description: Wet wet wipes without alcohol are specially designed to clean, nourish and refresh the skin. Pocket packaging allows you to carry them everywhere with you. Ideal for the whole family.

eko.title: Eko baby wipes
eko.description: Gently clean baby's skin in a natural way. They contain biodegradable fabric and ingredients from renewable sources. Soft and full, alcohol-free, maintain the natural pH value of the skin and are non-allergenic. The whole family can use them.

collaboration.title: Contract Manufacturing
collaboration.description: We provide contract manufacturing services according to your specifications and requirements. Our experience and technology enable us to produce products that meet your needs.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For all questions, contact us via email, phone, or at our address

footer.tagline: Reliable partner in the production and distribution of wet wipes for more than three decades.
